description: Mounting unrest and leaked Council evidence saturate the city; Sven receives urgent pleas to calm the public before violence erupts.
Sven discreetly unlocks Halden’s BCI simulations and schedules a broad public message, inviting every neighborhood to witness and debate possible futures for Stenograd.
BCI screens citywide activate with alternate histories. Forums quickly emerge as citizens gather around public displays, channeling anger into hopeful debate.
